item.title: Blog Post no. 1
item.description: Python and R! After taking this course, I have gained more knowledge about R Studio and began learning about Python! I have learned their differences, but they can still give the same outputs and can intertwine/communicate with one another using reticulate. Working With Reticulate First, I had to install reticulate from its library. Here is the R Studio code in assigning content to a variable: library(reticulate) school <- "One More" Here is the Python code in assigning content to a variable:
